title: Ontology of Microbial Phenotypes
main_domain: Microbial phenotypes across bacteria, archaea, protists, fungi, viruses

title: Ascomycete Phenotype Ontology
main_domain: Phenotypes of ascomycete fungi (e.g., budding yeast)

title: MicrO
main_domain: Prokaryotic phenotypic & metabolic characters, media, assays
maintenance_status: Unknown/low visible recent activity; listed in OLS/FAIRsharing

title: Microbial Conditions Ontology
maintenance_status: Production; initial release 2019; used in RegulonDB

title: VEuPathDB Ontology
main_domain: Application ontology for eukaryotic pathogens, vectors, hosts

title: Phenotype And Trait Ontology
main_domain: General phenotypic qualities used across species

title: Unified Phenotype Ontology
main_domain: Cross-species integration layer for phenotype ontologies
maintenance_status: Active; Ontobee version 2025-01-11; uPheno 2.0 work ongoing

title: Antibiotic Resistance Ontology
main_domain: AMR genes/mechanisms and associated resistance phenotypes
maintenance_status: Active; BioPortal update 2025-05-30; ongoing CARD integration

title: Ontology for Parasite LifeCycle
main_domain: Parasite lifecycle stages and context (often co-annotated with phenotypes)

title: Microbial Ecophysiological Trait & Phenotype Ontology
main_domain: Microbial ecophysiological traits & phenotypes (preferred/tolerated conditions, etc.)
